pages.text: The Cactus Talisman reflects 25% the amount of damage back at the attacking entity, does not modify incoming damage.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_advanced)Advanced Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_warrior)Force of Warrior$(/l).
